SPOTLIGHT Of all the methods MBO has employed over the years to raise awareness for independents in America, none has been more successful than research. That’s why MBO Partners is teaming up with the Career Advisory Board (CAB) to conduct this short, 10 question survey <https://mbopartners.co1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_0Bdwv1X6ccVMMkd> to better understand the skills and personal attributes needed to be a successful independent contractor or consultant.
Your participation in this survey will help provide advice and counsel to students, young adults and others who are considering a career as an independent professional. Oh - and you'll be entered in a drawing to win a 16GB iPad as a token of our appreciation. Gene Zaino President and CEO Connect with Gene <http://www.linkedin.com/in/genezaino> CREATING LONG-TERM VALUE FOR YOUR CLIENTS For most independent consultants, the key to long-term success and building long-term client relationships <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/6-tips-for-building-lasting-client-relationships> requires more than just delivering the projects they've asked you to complete, or advising them on strategic direction and execution. It requires consultants to create long-term value for clients that aren't simply measured by how well or how efficiently we complete our assignment, but rather how your work helped to meet overall business objectives.
Establishing business value propositions involves four steps: Defining exactly what the value is, communicating the value, integrating it and then measuring it. Here's what that looks like...
Read More <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/creating-long-term-value-your-clients> CONSULTING ON THE SIDE? MBO MAKES IT EASY Emily Stringer Consultant Services Advisor 703-793-6282 Connect with Emily <https://www.linkedin.com/pub/emily-stringer/5/819/926> Emily Stringer, a Consultant Services Advisor for MBO Partners, tells the story of a lawyer that saw an opportunity to consult on the side, and how MBO was able to help him get right to work - minus the administrative tasks.
“Developing a special skillset over a successful career, as well as building your professional network, can set you up well for consulting on the side. For this consultant, MBO was able to help remove some of the burdens of starting a solo business - so he could get to work doing what he loves.”
Who wouldn't want to line their pockets with some extra cash these days? Consultants from every industry are finding out that even in a down economy, the skills they've developed over a long career are still in demand. What that means is that in a new age of an economy blended with traditional and independent workers, the two work styles are not mutually exclusive.
Read More <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/consulting-side-mbo-makes-it-easy> MBO Q & A Q. How does MBO make billing easier?
A. Your online MBO Business Center gives you 24-hour access to an online financial dashboard enabling complete control and visibility over your business. This system can be used to view invoices, track payments, run reports, manage expenses and contact your personal Business Manager. Our MBO System has a robust tracking mechanism for time and expense approval, so your invoices go out accurately and on-time, keeping your revenue flowing.
